fields.name: Breakfast
fields.description: The first meal of the day, typically consumed in the morning after waking up. It provides the body with energy to start the day.

fields.name: Mid-Morning Snack
fields.description: A light snack consumed between breakfast and lunch, often to curb hunger and maintain energy levels.

fields.name: Lunch
fields.description: The main meal of the day, usually eaten in the middle of the day. It provides a significant portion of the daily caloric intake.

fields.name: Afternoon Snack
fields.description: A light snack consumed between lunch and dinner, often to prevent overeating at dinner and maintain energy.

fields.name: Dinner
fields.description: The evening meal, typically consumed in the late afternoon or evening. It is often lighter than lunch but still provides essential nutrients.

fields.name: Late-Night Snack
fields.description: A small snack consumed before bedtime, often to satisfy hunger or cravings before sleep.
